hero.title: This site is a database of accomodation points and types of help offered by people of good will to Ukrainian refugees fleeing the war.
hero.description: We help refugees find a free shelter provided by private people or institutions who are willing to help. Our portal's mission is to automatically connect potential places to stay with people in search based on defined needs.
hero.lookingForHelp: I am looking for a shelter

likeToHelp.title: Would you like to help?
likeToHelp.details:
If you have a home, room of place that you could make available for free to the refugees from the war in Ukraine, register as a volunteer by filling in the form regarding your accomodation.

Our application will automatically match registered people looking for help based on shared information.

weMatched.title: We were already able to match...

whatSosUaDoesSection.title: What SOS-UA does?

bulletPoints.0: Volunteers and institutions propose and describe available locations (type of accomodation, maximum amount of people, length of stay)
bulletPoints.1: People searching a shelter define their needs and minimum requirements (e.g., number of people, accomodation location)
bulletPoints.2: SOS-UA automatically connects people searching for shelters with the best fitting location

whatSosUaDoesSection.algorithmExplanation: The algorithm optimizes the process in order to help as many people as possible find shelters.
whatSosUaDoesSection.description: The portal connects people in need with institutions and people proposing their help.
